item.title: Tools I use
item.description:
I’ve seen youtubers add such lists in their description, tools they use for content creation, camera, lens, lights, even the keyboard they use.

I thought it would be fun to write mine and get to know what you use. I’m a Software Engineer by profession, most of the tools I use can be used in any sort of knowledge work.

  • Productivity & Note taking
  • AI & Development Tools
  • Hardware & Devices
  • Writing & Utilities

Productivity & Note taking

  1. Obsidian - For notes or jotting anything under the sun. This is where everything ends up. I’m using it since 2020. I have tried other note taking tools logseq, notion, joplin, simplenote and friends - paid, free and opensource but couldn’t use them as simply I use obsidian.
